医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示提示设计对 ChatGPT 健康建议准确性的影响CSIRO 和昆士兰大学的研究强调了提示的措辞如何影响 ChatGPT 提供的健康信息的准确性，显示出基于提示设计的有效性的显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Study-reveals-the-impact-of-prompt-design-on-ChatGPTs-health-advice-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Study-reveals-the-impact-of-prompt-design-on-ChatGPTs-health-advice-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc10ab09-6930-4a13-b764-f070453d80d8 Thu, 04 Apr 2024 22:06:00 -0400 Study reveals the impact of prompt design on ChatGPT's health advice accuracy
了解囊性纤维化感染背后的机制囊性纤维化是一种遗传性疾病，会导致严重甚至有时致命的呼吸和消化系统疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Understanding-the-mechanisms-behind-cystic-Fiberosis-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Understanding-the-mechanisms-behind-cystic-chemistry-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab60ebed-45c5-4763-a20b-5a62cfd77cdc Thu, 04 Apr 2024 16:11:00 -0400 Understanding the mechanisms behind cystic fibrosis infections
梅奥诊所研究表明活跃工作站对健康有益梅奥诊所最近的一项研究表明，包含步行垫、自行车、踏步机和/或站立式办公桌的活跃工作站是减少久坐时间和改善工作中心理认知而不降低工作绩效的成功策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Mayo-Clinic-research-shows-health-benefits-of-active-workstations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Mayo-Clinic-research-shows-health-benefits-of-active-workstations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90656172-dfea-42f5-8e9a-1b001e49d034 Thu, 04 Apr 2024 16:00:34 -0400 Mayo Clinic research shows health benefits of active workstations
研究发现，BMI 影响神经刺激治疗睡眠呼吸暂停的疗效一种治疗阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停的神经刺激疗法最初仅被批准用于体重指数 (BMI) 在健康范围内的患者，最近已扩展到 BMI 高达 40 的患者，这一体重范围通常被描述为严重肥胖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/BMI-influences-efficacy-of-nerve-stimulation-treatment-for-sleep-apnea-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/BMI-influences-efficacy-of-nerve-stimulation-treatment-for-sleep-apnea-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea4a3461-2307-4e92-bec4-accefc46a9bf Thu, 04 Apr 2024 15:54:00 -0400 BMI influences efficacy of nerve-stimulation treatment for sleep apnea, study finds
KFF 健康新闻“健康怎么样？”：佛罗里达州目前限制堕胎佛罗里达州本周成为堕胎辩论双方倡导者的主要焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Florida-limits-abortion-e28094-for-now.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Florida-limits-abortion-e28094-for-now.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22c91106-ce07-49f9-bbdd-2f8879535668 Thu, 04 Apr 2024 15:43:13 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Florida limits abortion — for now
颞下颌关节的恐怖：慢性疼痛、金属下颌和徒劳的治疗缅因州的一名颞下颌关节患者接受了六次手术，以替换部分或全部下颌关节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/The-horrors-of-TMJ-Chronic-pain-metal-jaws-and-futile-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/The-horrors-of-TMJ-Chronic-pain-metal-jaws-and-futile-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a9860b8-9364-4dbd-bec3-47cc4fa7ba59 Thu, 04 Apr 2024 14:02:57 -0400 The horrors of TMJ: Chronic pain, metal jaws, and futile treatments
研究表明医用大麻法对心理健康有积极影响批准大麻用于医疗用途对美国普通民众的心理健康影响不大。但以治疗为目的的合法化确实有利于那些其目标人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Study-shows-positive-impact-of-medical-marijuana-laws-on-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Study-shows-positive-impact-of-medical-marijuana-laws-on-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98a534c8-4fd2-412e-9483-0a584931dc2d Thu, 04 Apr 2024 09:24:10 -0400 Study shows positive impact of medical marijuana laws on mental health
SRF 宣布拨款支持成人 SynGAP 相关疾病的研究SynGAP 研究基金 501(c) 今天宣布向 Danielle Andrade 博士、Miles Thompson 博士、Ryan Yuen 博士、Rogier Kerssebook 博士和 Anatoljevna Anna Kattenidt 博士提供资助，以支持 SynGAP 相关疾病 (SRD) 的研究在成人中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/SRF-announces-grant-to-support-research-on-SynGAP-Related-Disorder-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/SRF-announces-grant-to-support-research-on-SynGAP-Related-Disorder-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2ca4ed9-d17d-4c02-aed4-ae0caa3b3ede Thu, 04 Apr 2024 08:57:52 -0400 SRF announces grant to support research on SynGAP-Related Disorder in adults

研究发现基因变异对肥胖风险有深远影响医学研究委员会 (MRC) 研究人员领导的一项研究发现了迄今为止发现的对肥胖风险影响最大的两个基因的遗传变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Study-identizes-genic-variants-with-profound-impact-on-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Study-identizes-genic-variants-with-profound-impact-on-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6120ee0-7d9f-40de-86ac-049230cffacb Thu, 04 Apr 2024 08:18:26 -0400 Study identifies genetic variants with profound impact on obesity risk
